string-array.name: textViewAppInfo_List
string-array.item: "On the Location setting screen, turn on Use location. "

"On the Carrier Location app screen, tap Allow all the time. (This app requires this level of access to work.)
"

string-array.item: "Note: Your carrier can access your device’s location when you dial or text an emergency number and for a limited time afterward, even if you turn off the location setting and deny location permission for this app. "
